Name: Living Dead
About the game: Living Dead is a fun coop wave based 3D shooter from a top view perspective. The Game takes place in a simulation of a zombie shooter and the goal is to survive as much waves as possible or beat them all. Each wave becomes more difficult than the previous one. By killing zombies you can acquire new weapons that will help you survive the swarm of zombies. KEY FEATURES 4 player co-op or solo play Earn and unlock unique skins (10 per class) Huge variety of guns (currently over 50) Class progression system Survive hordes of zombies alone or with friends
